channel.title: Course Introduction - Spring 2022 :: Introduction to Python
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Previous Versions Video Script [Slide 1] Hello and welcome to the Computational Core program! My name is Emily Alfs-Votipka, and Iâ€™ll be one of the instructors for this program. My contact information is shown here, and is also listed on the syllabus.
